Classes
Class
Description
AddBookWindow
Window that allows additional book's to be added to the library system.
AddPatronWindow
Window used to add a new patron to the library system.
BorrowBookWindow
Window that allows a patron to borrow a book from the library.
DeleteBookWindow
Window that allows users to perform a soft delete on books.
DeletePatronWindow
Window that allows administrators to perform a soft delete on patrons.
